verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker calico beans] [ARGM-ADV: with so many folks moving to meatless or healthier food choices] i decided to remove the meat from the original recipe but turn up the flavor the savory veggie blend balances the sweetness of the baked beans —david dixon shaker heights oh
